org.treetank.bucket.interfaces

Interface IReferenceBucket

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBucket
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IndirectBucket, RevisionRootBucket, UberBucket

    public interface IReferenceBucket
extends IBucket
    Interface denoting all buckets holding references to other buckets. The references are represented by the keys of the serialized storage.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int GUARANTEED_INDIRECT_OFFSET
      Guaranteed Indirect Offset from any ReferenceBucket.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long[] getReferenceKeys()
      Getting the keys of the referenced buckets.
      void setReferenceKey(int pIndex, long pKey)
      Setting one key of a bucket to be referenced from this bucket.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.treetank.bucket.interfaces.IBucket

        getBucketKey, serialize

    • Field Detail

      • GUARANTEED_INDIRECT_OFFSET

        static final int GUARANTEED_INDIRECT_OFFSET
        Guaranteed Indirect Offset from any ReferenceBucket.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getReferenceKeys

        long[] getReferenceKeys()
        Getting the keys of the referenced buckets.
        Returns:
        the keys for the referenced buckets.

      • setReferenceKey

        void setReferenceKey(int pIndex,
                   long pKey)
        Setting one key of a bucket to be referenced from this bucket.
        Parameters:
        pIndex - offset of the key to be referenced
        pKey - the key of the bucket to be referenced
